DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate expansion dietary option clear liquid entire day low reside breakfast lunch patient prior undergoing bowel preparation MoviPrep® effect preparation quality colonoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Diet Liberalization Bowel Preparation Colonoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate expansion dietary option clear liquid entire day low reside breakfast lunch patient prior undergoing bowel preparation MoviPrep® effect preparation quality colonoscopy . MoviPrep® commercially available 2 liter bowel purgative use colonoscopy adult 18 year age old comprise polyethylene glycol-electrolyte solution ( PEG-ELS ) plus sodium sulfate , sodium ascorbate , ascorbic acid .
DOC.criteria: Elective outpatient > 18 yr undergo colonoscopy Unable unwilling give inform consent Age < 18 year Pregnant Breast feeding Gastroparesis establish suspect Pseudoobstruction establish suspect Severe constipation ( < 1 BM week ) Bowel obstruction Colon resection Chronic nausea vomit Known Glucose6Phosphate Dehydrogenase ( G6PD ) deficiency PEG allergy Significant psychiatric illness
